Review.Contenu: You can easily find the correct part for your PC on their website and ordering is simple. The only downside is that delivery can take a while.

Shipping time said Royal Mail 48 Tracked but perhaps that was from when it arrived in the UK, as it was shipped from the Czech Republic, so ended up taking 2 weeks. Drive took a couple of times to accept the Cloning process but works fine and the read / write time is 100 times better than the HDD it replaced, so all good in the end.

Review.Titre: Loved the ease of finding what I needed…
Review.Contenu: Loved the ease of finding what I needed on the website, however I thought when visiting a UK site the items would be shipped from UK.Products are fine and arrived OK, but the delivery time was 10 days from ordering to arriving which isn't ideal. Fortunately I wasn't in a rush or my score would be lower because of this

Review.Titre: I have given 4 stars as order placed on…
Review.Contenu: I have given 4 stars as order placed on 20/09/23 and received on 12/10/23 - no fault with Crucial but down to the postage trail and customs clearance.

It would have been 5 stars, but I didn't expect my M2 drive to have to travel from the Czech Republic to Germany, and then The Netherlands before it even got to the Royal Mail delivery service in the UK.  For a couple of quid more, I could have got next-day delivery elsewhere instead of waiting 10 days for it to arrive.  Other than that, it's a great product, otherwise, I wouldn't have ordered it.

Review.Titre: Good product but a bit slow delivering
Review.Contenu: Good product but scanner still does not work properly and it took nearly 2 weeks to ship through customs etc Would I use them again? Yes if I need after market memory or SSD and don’t care about speed of arrival

Excellent item. Good details. Quality is sound. Very happy with the outcome of my iMac after the RAM upgrade. However the delivery took too long. Updates about intended delivery could have been useful. Apart from this, it’s been a a great experience.

Review.Titre: Installation of the new ssd and memory…
Review.Contenu: Installation of the new ssd and memory straightforward, the cloning software worked great and transferred all files within an hour, pc boot time reduced from 2 1/2 minutes to 30 seconds.Delivery however was not as fast as I expected, stock came from the Czech republic and this was not made clear while ordering. The Royal mail 24 was actually 10 days caused by cross European transport and customs clearance in Rotterdam.

Pretty fast delivery for being international. Products seem good quality but only time will tell. Very good price. Only issue is the acronis cloning software, its absolutely useless. Use macrium 30 day free trial instead.

Review.Titre: Memory works as expected so I’m happy
Review.Contenu: Memory works as expected so I’m happy. The only thing that let Crucial down on this occasion was delivery time. I found myself wishing I’d ordered the exact same chips from Amazon where I would have received the order the very next day.

The memory 2x8GB RAM Kit has certainly improved the working speed of my 2019 5K Retina iMac, and I am very pleased about this. Delivery was a little slow as the package was sent from the Czech Republic, which surprised me, however the price was good.
I like dealig with Crucial, I like the products I have always found them reliable and am happy to recognize them as an established leading brand.

Review.Titre: Ordered a SSD to replace my HDD to make…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a SSD to replace my HDD to make it faster. Arrived in a few days over Christmas as expected but what made it all good was the instructions for cloning and installing the SSD was available from the Crucial website and it made the whole process of swapping out the hard disk so much easier without any problems.

I have used Crucial memory products for many years and have been totally satisfied with their performance. The items on this order were no exception and I'm happy to have bought them>The only negative is the comparatively long delivery time which was disappointing.

I have found Crucial to be a great company to deal with, over many years.  I gave only 4 stars this time as I felt that the delivery time, about 8 days, was a little longer than I have previously experienced from Crucial.

Your agents are helpful, but I was disappointed that your PC upgrade scanner didn't differentiate the 2 types of existing drive my HP laptop had and recommended a SATA drive to replace my smaller M2. Windows SSD so I ordered the wrong part. However your returns procedure is hassle free.

expected delivery withing 5 days but took 7 days. this doesnt concern me as I always know products work as described. with it being international shipping, this I wasn't expecting  so maybe this was the delay in delivery. hence 4 star rating.

I am very happy with the product and price.It would be helpful to make it clear that the part I ordered is inside or outside the UK as the delays in customs clearance can be very frustrating if you have a machine off-line waiting for parts
The only downside was the delivery time. I was unaware that the product was not supplied from the UK. The online instructions for installation were very good and I did not have any problems.

To start with the memory I purchased was good value, which was about 14% off the usual price. Delivery was not as fast as previous purchases, however it was in time for Christmas and was good result has it was present. The memory has now been fitted with no problems and working well

Review.Titre: Good response from customer support and…
Review.Contenu: Good response from customer support and return/refund on item ordered in error was no problem. Third time I've dealt with the company and same good response level each time.

Review.Titre: Scanner guided me to the correct type…
Review.Contenu: Scanner guided me to the correct type of RAM needed for the laptop which once fitted worked perfectly.Only downside was that delivery could have been a bit quicker.

The Crucial website made it easy to choose an SSD upgrade, and the device works very well.I didn’t realise, at the time of the order that it would take such a long time to clear customs into the UK. I suppose that’s the fault of Brexit rather than Crucial, so still four stars.

Review.Titre: Putting In a SSD is not difficult
Review.Contenu: The installation guide for the SSD was very good and the software the clone the drive pretty good.  Delivery of the components to a lot longer than I expected but then it appeared to come from half way around the world.

Review.Titre: Good product but delivery could be…
Review.Contenu: Good product but delivery could be quicker if stocks were held locally

Choosing the correct memory chip for my iMac was made easier by the online tool provide by Crucial.Ordering & delivery were as described, no issues.Once installed the improvement to the iMac was immediately noticeable & wouldn't hesitate to upgrade again when necessary.
I like the way I can enter my pc details and the site only lists compatible hardware, the price was pretty good too, but it took a long time to arrive.

Review.Titre: I always get great service and products…
Review.Contenu: I always get great service and products from Crucial. Not five stars due to quite a wait for products to arrive...maybe strikes, I don't know. Will always use Crucial in future.

Review.Titre: Crucial gets all the key ingredients…
Review.Contenu: Crucial gets all the key ingredients bang on - the diagnosis tool and the quality of components is excellent, and the prices very reasonable.

Review.Titre: The delivery times let you down
Review.Contenu: The products are really good but the delivery times are not great. The shipment often arrives later than expected even if you pay extra.
Having fitted the SSD, I expected the laptop to be much faster. However, the apples has hardly increased which is very disappointing
The product itself works great and delivered within the time scale stated but 10 working days, (2 weeks) to get here!

Review.Titre: Worked like a charm, longer delivery than expected
Review.Contenu: The memories worked perfectly but I had to wait about 10 days to receive them although the delivery option said something like "two working days" or something similar.

I’ve used crucial a few times before. The experience and value for money is always good. This time I was a little disappointed that delivery took eight days. The items came from Prague and took their time. Apart from that all was as good as ever.

Review.Titre: Good quality memory but slow delivery
Review.Contenu: The memory arrived in good condition, well (over?) packaged but delivery was slow.
Great product. Slower deliver time than I had hoped. Not frustratingly slow- sub 2 weeks but not just on the edge of questioning if it was coming.

Review.Titre: Online chat agent located the correct RAM
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t find the correct RAM for my laptop using the online download tool, so contacting the live chat made a huge difference- the representative was able to find an alternative for me which helped a lot.

Review.Titre: Product was good and well packed
Review.Contenu: Product was good and well packed, but delivery took seven days.
The external drive works well - small and fast. I have always been very happy with Crucial products and have never had any issues.Delivery from Prague to the UK took 6 days.

Review.Titre: Website can be a bit more informative
Review.Contenu: Website can be a bit more informative. The product is good. Shipping took a bit long but the tracking is detailed and informative which is very good.

Review.Titre: Long wait for postage from the…
Review.Contenu: Long wait for postage from the Netherlands. Used to be shipped directly from the UK. Arrived packed, and securily. Haven't Installed it yet.

Review.Titre: replacement SSD swapped in and working…
Review.Contenu: replacement SSD swapped in and working fine, used a different cable on the caddy from elsewhere and all good on the second attempt
Good ssd, ok price, but it took forever to arrive.  Tiny envelope - why over 10 days to get here - I paid for the delivery after all.
It was great price and the RAM has vastly improved my PCs performance. The only minor criticism is that the packaging was a plastic bag rather than a box.

Review.Titre: I will be back - Good Size and Speed.
Review.Contenu: Ok price and it works as advertised.It did not work in an M.2 SATA socket ... that was my hope, but it is as expected.  Works fine in an external caddy (USB 3.2).I will keep an eye out for a larger (I have a 4TB NVMe PCIe 4.0) M.2 SATA drive.  (maybe a could of years?) :-D.I trust Crucial and I will be back.PS:  Took much longer than I had anticipated for delivery ... my issue I am used to things coming within 48 hours not just over a week.  Could just be a one off.

Review.Titre: it came aprox on the day stated.
Review.Contenu: it came aprox on the day stated.It was a little difficult to find my way back into the information needed regarding delivery
Very long delivery time which would have been fine if I’d been kept informed.  I hadn’t realised it had to come in through customs (Brexit strikes again)

Review.Titre: Helpfull but a long delay of severil days
Review.Contenu: Helpfull but a long delay of severil days after the first chat untill I chased it up then quick RMA agreement

Returned a product to Crucial for a refund, waited the 10 days for it to show in my account but it did not, so ring a very helpful lady at Crucial help desk who sorted the problem out and the refund was in my bank the next day.
Although a little late because of brexit it was as ordered and I have always found Crucial products reliable and the company helpful .

It took its time to arrive but that was expected, I’m glad that there was at least arrival and departure tracking given on the shipping website even when I hadn’t paid for express shipping and tracking.

Review.Titre: Online buying experience Let Down Only by Unexpectedly Longed Shipping Time
Review.Contenu: 5 out of 5 for online buying experience (selecting compatible products, checking out etc.)5 out of 5 for quality of products.  Worked well and easy to unpack fit1 out of 5 for shipping time transparency.  Took 9 days to arrive so not for anyone in a hurry.  Main problem is that I just didn't realise what was going on.  Products are now shipped from Czech Republic rather than Glasgow - have bought loads from Crucial but nothing since Brexit.  Shortly after placing the order tracking info showing Royal Mail Tracked 24 appears with status waiting for supplier to hand over the goods so I though it was going to be quick.  A couple of days later I noticed that there was a more elaborate tracking link that showed Prague as the origin.  It only took a couple of days after that to reach Heathrow, but then it sat there for 5 more days (not clear if stuck in customs or simply awaiting Royal Mail to collect it from there - my guess the latter).  After RM collected it, it was delivered the next day, a total of 9 working days after the order.  The website does state "clearly" if you bother digging into the small print that free delivery is 9-10 working days so they met their SLA.  It's more that I didn't notice it wasn't coming from East Kilbride anymore as it used to.  My bad ?Anyway, it arrived, it works.  It was 25% cheaper than Amazon for what I bought,  so overall I'm happy and would use again for things I'm not in hurry for and which are dramatically cheaper than elsewhere.If Crucial had stressed that products are supplied from the EU and that 5-10 Business days for free delivery means 5-10 Business days for delivery I would have given 5*.

Review.Titre: The web site gave the impression that…
Review.Contenu: The web site gave the impression that the Nmve was in the UK.It took 15 days to arrive and came from Prague, no tracking details.The good with out doubt the P5 1TB is the fastest drive i have ever used

Review.Titre: good product and service,just a bit…
Review.Contenu: good product and service,just a bit long on postage as i wasnt aware it had to come from budapest.

Review.Contenu: The purchase and refund work well.  Unfortunately just trying to upgrade the memory caused a terminal loss.
Identified the correct upgrade, kept me advised of progress.Purchased 01/02/2023Received goods 08/02/2023 (from the Czech Republic !)
Great product.  Good delivery tracking.  Cloning software did not work, but that may have been fault of very damaged old hard drive
Good ordering experience and great product. Only down side was having to wait so long for the product.

Review.Titre: Their website provided a free scan
Review.Contenu: Their website provided a free scan of my laptop followed by a number of recommendation and options that i could’ve chose as an upgrade. However it took a while until the delivery arrived. But overall im happy with the choice i have made.

Review.Titre: Easy order process and a good price for…
Review.Contenu: Easy order process and a good price for 16Gb memory stick. Gave 4 stars because of the delivery lead time
bought 2tb ssd, works fine cheapest on the market at the time, fast post from europe well pleased, recommended company

The product and price are great, but they are coming from Eastern Europe, and must pass through various points, including customs, before arriving. This is not a problem, if you are aware of the wait.
1Tb SSD for my HP AIO, £10 off usual price. Arrived in a reasonable time frame and cloned easily using free Acronis software from Crucial.
Easy to install with helpful video. However you receive less storage than advertised (in my case it said 2 TB, however it was actually 1.8 TB)

Review.Titre: Very easy to order products required
Review.Contenu: Very easy to order products required, website design made the whole experience easy for someone not completely OK with online shopping also the follow up with info on delivery was excellent.
Easy to find, compare and purchase. I have used Crucial previously and will do again, when required.

Easy to navigate site and use the tool to specify correct RAM upgrade. Only slight issue was it kept directing me to US website to complete purchase?? Just copied and pasted RAM detail into UK website version and all worked fine. Speedy delivery.

Review.Titre: SSD upgrade on my old GA Z170XL-SLI Mainboard
Review.Contenu: I needed an SSD 'system disk' upgrade. I tried an alternative mfr but my not so modern Mainboard wouldn't even boot with it (even though all the specs looked OK). Crucial on the other hand not only guided me to the appropriate SSD but also guaranteed compatibility.I took a full image of the old SSD, upon installation of the Crucial SSD the PC booted and I returned the image to the new 'disk' which, following recovery, booted as before (but at little faster and with twice the capacity of the former.What more can I expect!

Regarding Crucial, I'm a 'returning customer' which should give you a clue. Good quality products and service at a sensible price. My latest purchase was Crucial's X9 SSD which they managed to deliver to me from the Czech Republic in less time than the Royal Mail takes to deliver my bank statements!

Review.Titre: Apart from the delivery time and the…
Review.Contenu: Apart from the delivery time and the item description on the invoice. Perfect
I've brought many products of this company as I believe for the price point thay are the best always excellent service

Review.Titre: I got my purchase as ordered and i am…
Review.Contenu: I got my purchase as ordered and i am very happy with it. The only slight gripe was that the item came from Prague via Germany and Holland and finally into UK.I may have ordered a different item had i known this as the RAM came within 24 hours
Took 3 attempts using Acronis software to clone HDD to Crucial SSD MX500. But now its done my Laptop is flying, its like a new machine.

Review.Titre: I love the Crucial X8 drives
Review.Contenu: I love the Crucial X8 drives.  Very fast and tough enclosures.  I have three now being used to run virtual machines and store videos.
I been using crucial since 2013First ssd bought then.I always use crucial for ssd nvme p5 plus.All my pc and laptop.There products are outstanding.My first ssd still running till this date.

Great and clear instructions for installation. A eally good product with big 2tb capacity and with heat sink keeping it cool, making my Sony PS5 capacity doubled. Would highly recommend this product for PS5 user's.

Review.Titre: Great option to find technical components
Review.Contenu: I was able to chat with an advisor to confirm the two components I needed were compatible with my machine.The components were competitively priced and the web site was good.Delivery took a few days but the items were sourced in Europe, so not unreasonable.
An amazing SSD for an amazing price. Works great in my PS5

Sensible technical advice about use of SSD with Linux ( not actually supported, but should not be a problem). It worked and at a very good price.Also good support when the shipping company messed up and misplaced the shipment in their system.Have used them before and found their products to do exactly what you expect at a sensible price.
Crucial's RAM modules are always extremely reliable, and are excellent at breathing new life into PCs that have begun to slow down.

Very easy to use website, with easy to use shopping cart and checkout tracking was simple and clear and the goods arrived quick enough to think it was local postage not from Europe perfect goods at perfect price with no messing.
Brilliant.   Online guide on crucial website helped me find the memory I needed for my laptop,  I ordered and within 2 days it arrived.  Fitted and working.

Review.Titre: Excellent item and price. Shame about the time it took to arrive
Review.Contenu: The item arrived, I appreciate that due to customs etc. it took rather longer than I expected.I followed the tracking and it seemed to stop at one of its waypoints for an age.Forewarning us of the timing would have been helpful. May I also suggest that you or your agent could update the seller  of any change to the package's location. But 14 days enroute seems excessive.
Very good service.SSD arrived well packaged.Plugged into USB port on TV to record programs.Worked first time, no reformatting reqd.

A good experience with Crucial. Their system checker made choosing the correct memory and SSD an easy, worry-free, process. Prices were very competitive, with a good selection of sizes and speeds of memory and drive available. Delivery wasn't next day (I did not pay for next day), but it was reasonable (around a working week).
The item arrived quickly and in perfect condition and does the job it is supposed to, a great service in suppling the correct part. highly recomended. Thank you.

Everything worked. The scanning process worked, upgrade spec was correct and the memory and SSD installed without problems using the online software provided. I wouldn't bother with any other upgrade supplier because Crucial have bossed the entire process.

My SSD duly arrived, and I must admit I was a bit wary of installing it, but after reading the instructions several times, I got down to it.  I found it surprisingly straight forward  to do and at 71 if I can do it, well enough said. So thankyou Crucial for the very informative instructions. Laptop now much quicker.
The price was excellent. The device itself is great. But the delivery service was poor with the package sitting at Stanstedt for 6 days and only moving when /i queried it

Price was cheap, item arrived within the promised 5-10 days, I received no additional fees that I am aware of.Very happy customer with Crucial products, currently have two MX500 SATA solid state drives in active service and they work like a charm. I have no fears of data loss buying from Crucial. Would buy again.

Arrived and started Clone. Surprised it forecast 10 hours but it must have completed in somewhere between 4 and about  6 when I found it had finished. Installed drive and system is running like it was when new!!! In fact perhaps better. No real problems.

Review.Titre: Over the years Crucial has been my…
Review.Contenu: Over the years Crucial has been my preferred supplier of RAM having used them many times. This time I bought a SATA SSD drive and a M.2 SSD which arrived very well packaged and which are now installed and working perfectly. My only small niggle was that it took 12 days for the goods to arrive. They seemed to have been shipped from outside of the UK (I couldn't find any information about this on their web site) but I was in no particular hurry and so it's a minor point.
Having used crucial ssd for upgrades before I felt confident in using there product and associated cloning software.I was not dissappointed, straight forward clone and swap in new ssd

Review.Titre: Super Simple To Find The Correct Memory
Review.Contenu: This is the first time I have used Crucial and their website made it super simple to find the correct memory for my laptop even though it is seven years old. Quick tutorial on YouTube and up and running with double the RAM!

Delivery a day late despite the ~£9 faster delivery, took around 6 days to arrive but other than that, absolutely perfect. Installed my 2x16GB 3200MHz RAM sticks in my laptop within a few minutes and not had a single issue. Couldn’t recommend enough. Quality product and beyond reasonable prices.

Review.Titre: Simple upgrade to breathe new life into a second hand ThinkCentre M720Q
Review.Contenu: I bought a Crucial P5 Plus 1TB M.2 NVMe SSD and two 16GB DDR4 memory sticks for a second hand (renewed) ThinkCentre M720Q.  I am a repeat (and happy) customer as I have bought Crucial memory and SATA SSDs in the past for Thinkpads.  Always very easy to fit - and the old 250GB drive was easily cloned to the new, larger, Crucial drive.  It took a little while for the delivery to arrive as it came from the Czech Republic via Germany and the Netherlands before arriving in the UK - 11 days from placing the order until it arrived, and I could monitor shipment progress via the supplied link.

My wife complained that her aging laptop was running to slow and was looking at spending a lot o a new laptop. I ran the Crucial scan, which was simple, and the result recommended more memory and a SSD, I decided to risk the £80 cost and give it ago. We are astounded at the difference it has made, the laptop now runs faster than her modern work laptop. I not plan to upgrade my aging desktop and hopefully it too will run better.

Review.Titre: Easy to order and prompt delivery.

Review.Contenu: Easy to find, compare, select and pay for.

The DIY video tutorial is also very good guide. The laptop is running better and faster now. Thanks to Crucial. Keep up the good work.
